definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Xiang Chu Culture"is the spiritual treasury of Hunan."
sentences.chinese: 湘楚文化是湖南人民精神财富的宝库。

sentences.english: Tonie has left us with countless memories and treasures.
sentences.chinese: 托力给我们留下了数不尽的美好记忆和精神财富。

sentences.english: He wants us to create a spiritual legacy of generosity.
sentences.chinese: 他希望我们创造慷慨的精神财富。

sentences.english: The enormous value of the Resolution is our valuable spiritual wealth.
sentences.chinese: 《决议》的巨大价值是我们宝贵的精神财富。

sentences.english: Wuzhen has been home to famous people since ancient times, who left valuable spiritual wealth for posterity.
sentences.chinese: 乌镇自古名人辈出，为后人留下了宝贵的精神财富。

sentences.english: The working song is a valuable spiritual wealth and cultural inheritance.
sentences.chinese: 这是一笔可贵的精神财富和不朽的文化遗产。

definition: material and spiritual culture/matter and mind/material progress, ideology and culture (philosophic slogan, adopted into Deng Xiaoping theory from 1978)
pinyin: wu4 zhi4 wen2 ming2 he2 jing1 shen2 wen2 ming2

definition: deposits accumulated over long periods/fig. valuable experience, accumulated wisdom
lit. the flame of a burning piece of firewood passes on to the rest (idiom)/fig. (of knowledge, skill etc) to be passed on from teachers to students, one generation to another
to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
the way of one's conduct and interaction in society (idiom)
